message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. Is this something you'd be interested in?
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but $110 is a bit more than I'm hoping to spend. Would you be willing to come down to $105?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob! I can do $108, which is the lowest I can go. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
